enabled.description:
enabled = <boolean>.
* Set whether or not to enable debugging.
* Default: 0

attachTimeout.description:
attachTimeout = <integer>
*The amount of time, in seconds, to wait for the debugger to attach.
* Default: 20

createLaunchJson.description:
createLaunchJson = <boolean>
* Automatically create a Splunk Enterprise debug configuration for the project.
* Default: 1

debugPort.description:
debugPort = [generate | <integer>]
* Automatically generate a debug port, or specify a static debug port.
* Default: generate
